Statute.Title: Resources and Technical Surveys Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Levés et l’inventaire des ressources naturelles, Loi sur les)

Minister.Text: Minister of Natural Resources; Minister of Fisheries and Oceans (1978-79, c. 13, s. 34); Minister of the Environment (c. 14 (2nd Supp.), s. 9) see s. 2 of the Act

CIF.Text: CIF, 1994, c. 41, ss. 33 to 35 in force 12.01.95 see SI/95‑10
